chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
si: sorted_interface
llsli: leaderLogs_sublog_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
taifoi: terms_and_indices_from_one_interface

Goal:
forall (n : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (i : name) (l : logIndex) (t' : term) (l' : list entry) (l'' : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries n st t i l t' l' l'' = (st', m) -> ~ is_append_entries m

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
term = nat : Set
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwP
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface { leaderLogs_sorted_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_sorted net } Arguments leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record leaderLogs_sublog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_sublog_interface { leaderLogs_sublog_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_sublog net } Arguments leaderLogs_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope

name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
logIndex = nat : Set
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then (RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_commitIndex term name entry log
Record leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface { leaderLogs_term_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_term_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate net } Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface
Record leaderLogs_contiguous_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_contiguous_interface { leaderLogs_contiguous_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_contiguous net } Arguments leaderLogs_contiguous_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_contiguous_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope

handleAppendEntries_same_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st

handleAppendEntriesReply_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (h' : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (t' : term) (es' : list entry), handleAppendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci = (st', AppendEntriesReply t' es' true) -> t' = t /\ es' = es /\ (forall e : entry, In e es -> In e (log st') \/ haveNewEntries st es = false /\ log st' = log st)
handleAppendEntries_currentTerm : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'
handleAppendEntries_same_term_votedFor_preserved : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st -> votedFor st' = votedFor st

update_elections_data_appendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => let (_, m) := handleAppendEntries me (snd st) t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit in match m with | AppendEntriesReply t0 entries0 true => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := cronies (fst st); leaderLogs := leaderLogs (fst st); allEntries := map (fun e : entry => (t0, e)) entries0 ++ allEntries (fst st) |} | AppendEntriesReply t0 entries0 false => fst st...
in_app_iff : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ l') < -> In a l \/ In a l'
removeAfterIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix removeAfterIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if eIndex e <=? i then e :: es else removeAfterIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments removeAfterIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
